author: __lithp__
content:
I'm making some progress on (2) and (3), have a couple hundred lines of go which have TurboGeth read from the database and trace blocks and emit the set of touched accounts: 

Currently working on making sure I haven't missed any places it reads from the database, then I'll be ready to run it over the last million blocks.

author: __lithp__
content: Does anyone have ideas for what format would be useful for sharing this with others? I think this dump could answer a lot of different questions and it might make sense to work on them in parallel. My current thought is to build and share a sqlite file with a schema which looks like a bunch of (block #, touched account) rows ?

author: pipermerriam
content: We can iterate on the format.
